title: Pie Maker Spag Bol Muffins
directions: Cook the spaghetti in a large saucepan of boiling water for 12 minutes or until just cooked. Drain and run under cold water. Chop into smaller lengths using scissors.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the mince and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until browned. Add the pasta sauce. Simmer for 10 minutes or until thick. Season. Set aside to cool slightly.
Combine the pasta, mince mixture, eggs, flour, parsley and half of the cheese.
Turn on the pie maker. Fill the hopes with the mixture. Top with half of the remaining cheese. Cook for 10 minutes or until set. Repeat with the remaining mixture.
